features: LED Projector: Our LED Projector with highest Native Resolution which can meet all your home entertainment games or indoor and outdoor movies. It’s also ideal for education and business for small environment in dark.

Big Bonus Video Projector for Customers: Our video projector owns the highest native resolution, and max support resolution is 1980*1080. Projection display is 40”-170” at the distance of 1-4M (The ideal projection display is 120” in 3M) . Aspect ratio is 16:9 / 4:3 with manual focus and keystone on projector.

Longer Lamp Life & Protect Your Eye Well LED Projector: Our LCD Projector has five layer LCD Display which allows the projector lamp life max support to 60,000 hours. The LED light source can perfectly protect you and your family’s eyes. It’s definitely the best choice for your home theater entertainment.

Multimedia Projector with Flexible Connectivity: Our video projector has AV/USB/SD/HDMI/VGA/Headphone plug which allows you to play most media players on it like PCs, Macs, Video Games like PS4, Blue-ray DVD player, TV Stick and mobile devices (Wireless display dongle not included.)

Three Year 100% Satisfied Guarantee: Our Projector offer every customer a 100% satisfied guarantee and 3 year Money Back Guarantee. If there is any questions you met, you can contact us freely to get an immediate reply from our professional technical department.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm tips from seller 1.If the projector is not projecting, please make sure the lens cap is removed. It's easier to get it off if you adjust the focus knob so it pushes out of its recessed position. 2.Copyright videos like Netflix, Prime video and etc. need to be connected to a TV stick or HDMI cable to enjoy. 3.If there is no sound coming out, please turn off the Dolby audio of your TV stick. 4.Your understanding will be highly appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Movie/tv shows!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this after making the mistake of buying a mini projector off of temu (yeah Ik, it was awful what was I expecting..) but this one was much better! I got it delivered same day I bought it and immediately hung it up from my wall to watch some Star Trek! best viewed after dark or in a room with blackout curtains/no windows. The image quality is pretty good, you can adjust the tilt/focus using the little scroll at the top and the switch on the side. The fan is a bit loud, but the speakers still sound good and clear- it’s just like a fan is on in the background. If that bothers you, it easily connects to other speakers, although I haven’t felt like I needed them anyways. I’m yet to see how it holds up overtime, but overall I’m very pleased with my purchase!Also quick tip for my folks with no free space on their walls to protect on: hang a white bedsheet from your ceiling! It works perfectly as a projector screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight compact and it gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: At $60 you can't really get any less expensive and expect much.It really couldn't be any easier to set-up. There is a power cord in the box and a remote to control the input, menu, and power. I was able to plug in to my home theater computer and the HDMI input recognized the source immediately.The projector is light and seems durable enough. There is a dust cap to keep the lens clean while transporting, the highest native resolution, and max support resolution is 1980x1080. You can watch movies/television via connection with a TV, computer, streaming stick, connect to your android or iPhone or video player. You also have the capability to view content stored on USB or Micro SD cards.The size of your image is solely dependent on your distance from the screen. While most true theater purists would tell you that any digital adjustment to the picture size invites picture imperfections, this is just a case where the picture options are basic. My theater screen is 100" so I set the projector on top of my table to set the projector on and use the single height foot to angle the image up and correct with keystone, image is pretty good no complaints.I bought this for my granddaughters to watch their favorite shows.Would I recommend this? I would not doubt but depending on what you're looking to use it for. This would be a great way to keep kids entertained by hooking up a Wii or Switch. Also an affordable outdoor projector and for taking on a camping trip.Great little portable projector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The picture is great
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The picture is still great without a screen. I just connected my Amazon fire tv stick to it. It’s affordable and serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to set up. I couldn't believe how sharp the image was even on the wall. Hooked the firestick up and was watching movies in minutes. I have a larger projector and this one is by far better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted the projector for a movie room and then my TV broke. The price was great! I spend more on food delivery.The product was delivered on time in it's original box, all needed material was included. A c port HDMI converter is NOT included (purchase separately if the intent is to play content from a cell phone without something to cast to like a chromcast or fire stick.The unit is smaller than I thought which was a pleasant surprise. I've connected a chromcast and PS5 to the projector so far, and use a Bluetoothe speaker for better sound quality. I have not tested the sound quality directly from the projector.With the two year warranty I have confidence that any unforeseen issues will be addressed.Overall, I got exactly what I expected for a great price, my boyfriend and I currently fight over how gets to be entertained in the living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars USB connection does not work
reviews.reviewText: The USB to USB from my Chromebook to the projector does not work. What should I do?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product. Really good deal for the money
reviews.reviewText: It's like having 120 inch big screen TV. Really amazing movie theater quality when paired with a great soundbar. It's like being at the movies 🍿

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap... And it shows
reviews.reviewText: I initially got this because it had decent reviews and I'll admit it was very inexpensive. Finally got everything set up with the Mount and screen and placed it like the instructions said for Best picture. I noticed there are lines that travel from down low to up high and offset the picture for a split second. Almost like looking at an object halfway through water. Unfortunately now that I noticed it I can't not notice it. And unless it is perfectly centered with zero keystone adjustment the picture quality is inconsistent from the center to the edges. Decent quality in the center and extremely blurry on the outside. Will be returning for a better product.
The media could not be loaded. Image quality nor video quality is good .Voice 👎worthless it is
